thread.section_title: Devon Valley Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: we enjoyed our stay
thread.title_full: we enjoyed our stay - Review of Devon Valley Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Sylvaine R
title: we enjoyed our stay
text: My jusband and I spent 3 nights at the Devon Valley Hotel, it was the first time and we really enjoyed our stay. The staff is very friendly and helpful in any way, I travelled with my bicycle and I could leave it in the storeroom with peace in mind. the only downside is that the last night, we had to deal with a very happy cricket, which decided to sing all night in the bathroom!
